title: Selection of a formula or provide us one.
description: R&D teams create the product formulation based on requirements, regulations,costs and chemicals properties

title: Enrich your product with our specialities.
description: Dead Sea minerals, organic oils, natural extracts & herbs, vitamins, peptides, or any special ingredients.

title: Sampling process.
description: R&D begins laboratory work to produce samples based on your requirements and until you are satisfied.

title: Product final validation.
description: Product prototype final approval: formula, packaging, everything is checked defore mass production.
